title: Maharani Diamond Haaram Set with Jhumkas - A Timeless Treasure
features: Intricate filigree work showcases a classic South Indian design. The necklace features a cascading arrangement of diamonds and gemstones, culminating in a grand pendant. Traditional mango (Maanga Malai) motifs are subtly woven into the design. Jhumkas echo the necklace's design with a paisley top and pearl drop.
colors: accented by vibrant ruby red and emerald green. Creamy white South Sea Pearls offer a soft contrast.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Also suitable for Seemantham (baby shower)
description: This Haaram set is a symbol of timeless elegance and traditional South Indian craftsmanship. The combination of high-quality diamonds, precious gemstones, and lustrous South Sea pearls makes it a truly exquisite heirloom piece. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine, while the intricate design reflects cultural heritage and unparalleled artistry. A statement piece that will be treasured for generations.
